title: Pedestrian Congestion
desc:
The Pedestrian Congestion data visualization focuses on important bridges in Venice as points of interest for measuring pedestrian congestion. The visualization is based on data stretching back to the year 1950, and as such, users are presented with a slider, and are able to view statistics related to the pedestrian congestion of these bridges based on the desired year.

Click on the floating button in the bottom right-hand corner to check it out!
